title: Alcatraz Island: Current Conditions
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Current Conditions             Alerts & Conditions         Alerts    Information        Alcatraz Island Tickets Selling Out in Advance!  Alert 1 , Severity ,information ,, Alcatraz Island Tickets Selling Out in Advance!  Tickets for Alcatraz are currently selling out a month in advance. Night tour tickets sell out even sooner. Order your tickets up to 90 days in advance at alcatrazcruises.com advance to avoid disappointment. more          Recreation Yard Access  Alert 2 , Severity ,information ,, Recreation Yard Access  Due to restoration work on exterior walls of the cellhouse the recreation yard is not currently accessible from the cellhouse. It can still be entered from the north side via a trail and a long stairwell.
